com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers

Class AbstractFieldStyler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.ParameterizableImpl
      • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractStyler
        • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AdvancedImpl<DATATYPE>
          • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractPositioning<Object>
            • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractFieldStyler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPCellEvent, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfPTableEvent, com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, DocumentAware, ElementProducing, LayerManagerAware, BaseStyler, FormFieldStyler, Advanced<Object>, Cloneable, Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FieldBackground, FieldBorder, FieldFont

    public abstract class AbstractFieldStyler
extends AbstractPositioning<Object>
implements FormFieldStyler, ElementProducing
    Base class for drawing form fields on the canvas of a cell.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

      • style

        public <E> E style(E element,
          Object data)
        throws com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        calls create() and #setFieldValues(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.BaseField) and registers this FormFieldStyler as a PdfPCellEvent when element is null or when the DebuggablePdfPCell does not contain a BaseField yet. Subclasses should first call this style method and after this call getFromCell(java.lang.Object) to get hold of the BaseField and style it. The BaseField is drawn on the PdfPTable.TEXTCANVAS of the cell.
        Specified by:
        style in interface BaseStyler
        Overrides:
        style in class AdvancedImpl<Object>
        Type Parameters:
        E -
        Parameters:
        element -
        data -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException

      • draw

        protected void draw(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas,
        float x,
        float y,
        float width,
        float height,
        String genericTag)
             throws com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        Specified by:
        draw in class AbstractPositioning<Object>
        x - the calculated x position to draw, influenced by AdvancedImpl.getShiftx()
        y - the calculated y position to draw, influenced by AdvancedImpl.getShifty()
        width - width of the Chunk that was drawn or -1
        height - height of the Chunk that was drawn or -1
        genericTag - the generic tag that caused the call to this method
        Throws:
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        See Also:
        Advanced.getDelayed(java.lang.String)
